section.title: Terminology and notation

li.title: scalar-triangular form
li.p: an upper or lower triangular matrix that has the same value repeated down the main diagonal

section.p: The remaining terminology and notation are relative to a square matrix A and a specific eigenvalue \lambda for that matrix.

li.title: generalized eigenvector
li.p: a nonzero vector that is in the null space of the matrix (\lambda I - A)^k for some positive integer k

li.title: generalized eigenspace
generalized eigensubspace of degree k
li.p: the nullspace of the matrix (\lambda I - A)^k; denoted E^k_{\lambda}(A)
